title: The Family Fang by Kevin Wilson {dwg}
description:
Mr. and Mrs. Fang called it art.

Their children called it mischief.

Performance artists Caleb and Camille Fang dedicated themselves to making great art. But when an artistÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s work lies in subverting normality, it can be difficult to raise well-adjusted children. Just ask Buster and Annie Fang. For as long as they can remember, they starred (unwillingly) in their parentsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ madcap pieces. But now that they are grown up, the chaos of their childhood has made it difficult to cope with life outside the fishbowl of their parentsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ strange world.

When the lives theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve built come crashing down, brother and sister have nowhere to go but home, where they discover that Caleb and Camille are planning one last performance -Ã¢â‚¬â€œ their magnum opus -Ã¢â‚¬â€œ whether the kids agree to participate or not. Soon, ambition breeds conflict, bringing the Fangs to face the difficult decision about whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ultimately more important: their family or their art
